doc.title: Young Pretender: The Story of Bonnie Prince Charlie
doc.plot: Charles Edward Stuart, Scotland's Prince. Born in exile and raised to reclaim the throne of Scotland, England, and Ireland for his father. He led the Jacobites down a heroic but devastating path, on a mission he could never fulfill. Hunted by a "Butcher," confused by a religion, and saved by Flora Macdonald. Follow the "Young Pretender" as he fights, triumphs, and finds himself outmatched on the battlefield of Culloden, leading to the destruction of the Highland Way and the disappointment of a nation he was destined to save.
